Desc.entry: Mr Beech offers private tutoring in maths at university foundation level, A level, GCSE and Key Stage 3. Has over 29 years experience teaching maths in local secondary schools and external exam marking. Has a current enhanced CRB certificate. Provides weekly tutorials, one-off tutorials or longer workshops. Also offers A-level/GCSE revision workshops for individuals and for schools during term-time and during school holidays prior to main exams.
